UPDATE tbl_betting b

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET SUCCESS_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND bg.GUESS = g.RESULT AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID AND g.STATUS = 'GS004' ) WHERE b.CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET FAILURE_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND ((bg.GUESS != g.RESULT AND g.TYPE='wdl') OR (bg.GUESS != g.RESULT AND g.RESULT != 'D' AND g.TYPE='handy')) AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID AND g.STATUS = 'GS004' ) WHERE b.CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET HANDYDRAW_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND (bg.GUESS != g.RESULT AND g.RESULT = 'D' AND g.TYPE='handy') AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID AND g.STATUS = 'GS004' ) WHERE b.CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET NOMATCH_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID AND g.STATUS = 'GS005' ) WHERE b.CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET STATUS = (CASE WHEN FAILURE_COUNT > 0 THEN 'BS003' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = NOMATCH_COUNT THEN 'BS005' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = HANDYDRAW_COUNT THEN 'BS007' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = (SUCCESS_COUNT + NOMATCH_COUNT) THEN 'BS002' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = (SUCCESS_COUNT + HANDYDRAW_COUNT) THEN 'BS002' ELSE 'BS001' END) WHERE STATUS != 'BS004' AND CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET CALC_STATUS = 'BTC02' WHERE STATUS in ('BS005', 'BS002', 'BS007') AND CALC_STATUS != 'BTC10' AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET CALC_STATUS = 'BTC10' WHERE STATUS = 'BS003' AND TOTAL_COUNT = (FAILURE_COUNT + NOMATCH_COUNT + HANDYDRAW_COUNT) AND b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#)
